website_summaries.verdict: This table-ready board sells for a top price, but we wish it used a better end grain.
pros: Could be used as a presentation board
Reversible with a juice trough on one side
cons: Some reports of warping and chipping
Surface can be rough and uneven

customer_reviews.title: Arrived water damaged and cracked
customer_reviews.text: Arrived water damaged and cracked...Literally was splitting at one of the glue joints upon arrival... I will be returning it and do not intend to get another
customer_reviews.author: billabyte

customer_reviews.title: In a pinch this cutting board fit my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good quality cutting board. A few to many knots IMO but they aren't in vulnerable areas to worry about. Teak seems oil hungry and that's OK in my book. Compared to my maple end-grain board the Teakhaus is much more forgiving on my expensive Japanese knives! Packing was sufficient but could have been better.
customer_reviews.author: KD Cano

customer_reviews.title: Cutting board unusable
customer_reviews.text: The cutting board was a Christmas gift for my husband. The board initially appeared in well order and was stored away until needed. Upon closer inspection a month or so later we noted that the wood was split on the backside of the board. The board had never been used. By the time we noticed the defect and got around to making a return the return window has passed. The split is not reparable.
customer_reviews.author: Dana M.

customer_reviews.title: I love the heft and quality of this cutting board
customer_reviews.text: I love the heft and quality of this cutting board. I haven't had any warping issues. I soaked the board in mineral oil for two weeks before the first use. Would have given 5 stars but took off 1 star since the drip edge is too small. If you're carving a 20 pound turkey the juices quickly fill the grove and spill onto the counter top. Got out my router and not only tripled the size of the grove but made a catch basin on one end. Now I'm ready for Thanksgiving this year.
customer_reviews.author: Mark in Malvern

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cutting board!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome cutting board. I originally ordered the 24" x 18" x 1.5" version but it would fit in my storage cabinet so I exchanged it. This one is still plenty large but a bit more manageable. It needs conditioning out of the box so make sure you order some mineral oil or other conditioner along with it - you'll want to protect it so it is around a long time. I used. Worked well and a lot cheaper than some of the branded products. It's really all you need.
customer_reviews.author: JRM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Teak Cutting Board - Question long-term durability
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful piece - as soon as we received it, I proceeded to season the board with the Boos Lock oil and cream. The pictures are of the board 24 hrs after 2 coatings of oil and 1 coating of cream. After placing it in my counter top I regret not having purchased the board with silicone feet/corners (the cream makes the board slippery and greasy). Upon close inspection, I noticed one of the corners is slightly damaged - (2nd picture). I hope the wood doesn’t chip in the near future. I know I could ask the Seller for a replacement but I already spent too much time with the board.
customer_reviews.author: A Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged
customer_reviews.text: Chip our of edge of cutting board. Not sure if done in transit or was like that when shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Cutting Board
customer_reviews.text: This board is all around fantastic. Strong, durable and beautiful to see. As a matter of fact, those who come into the kitchen, their eyes are just drawn to it and compliments on the look is positive. Having said that, the durability under knife and cleaver (the important things) is wonderful. Yes over time you will have to resand the cuts out and retreat it, but, that is really little effort. Cleaning is as simple as, spray with white vinegar and rinse off dry...you're done.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful board with slight damage.
customer_reviews.text: Nice board but there was some slight damage to the bottom edge of the board. The box wasnt damaged so i have to assume this occurred prior to shipping. It looks like someone dropped something or the board on the bottom edge. Not worth a return and i think i can effect a repair with wood glue and a vice. All in all the board is beautiful and well constructed, stout as heck, and once i oiled it, oh man does it look good. Im satisfied, and im sure ill get years of good use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cutting board
customer_reviews.text: The Teakhaus (24x18.1.5) cutting board is great. Completely flat (as a board) and beautiful. This is a great dual sided board (one side has a channel for meat juices and the other side is completely flat). I highly recommend this cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: JHN

customer_reviews.title: great cutting board. large enough to use as countertop
customer_reviews.text: very high quality cutting board and looks great. It is wide enough to put it front to back on the counter and it will reach the wall. So i used it as a countertop on a side set of drawers, allowing me to extend my counter another 18 inches. i put the drawers next to my stove so the cutting board is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl A.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Item was beautiful right out of the box. Both sides were finished to perfection, but I gave each a mineral oil treatment the first day and let that finish properly before first use. I've been around the kitchen since I was a child and I am well into my 60s now; this is the best cutting board I have ever used. I got the 20" since since it was perfect for my space. I hope your experience matches mine.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Whittington

customer_reviews.title: Best cutting board ever!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have bought this years ago. After watching America's test kitchen, it made sense to get a good size (24x18) board that had some weight to it to keep stable on the counter as well as not have food falling off all over . Teak is great and I really love my new Teakhaus board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Teakhaus - Rectangle Cutting Board With Hand Grip and Juice Canal
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality cutting board ,heavy and stable when working. Oil it up wait for 24hrs. and it's ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Mug Head

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I keep a cutting board on my counter all the time. This is the perfect size. It covers all but enough room for a row of artisanal oils and vinegars. I love the channel around the edge to catch anything that wants to run off and the bonus grip carved into the short edge makes it easy to lift (to clean under). It seems to deliver on being easier on my knives than my last cutting board. I am sharpening less frequently. But most of all, it’s absolutely beautiful. I have been using it multiple times each day for a few months and it still looks new. I absolutely love this gorgeous cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Solid, beautiful and works!
customer_reviews.text: America's Test Kitchen was correct, this is the best cutting board I've ever owned! Its solid enough that I never worry that its going to slide, the grooves are deep enough to easily catch liquid and its soft yet hard enough that my fairly expensive knives are fine after several months of use. Added bonus is that it raises my counter height a bit and is gorgeous, so I rarely bother to put it up. Best thing I can say about it is that I love to host; every person I've had use it has either bought it or put it on their wish list.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were good for two weeks but they have started to warp
customer_reviews.text: These were good for two weeks but they have started to warp. I purchased 4 which was not cheap overall so I obviously had high hopes for them. We haven't experienced any rain so these warped solely from exposure to the sun. We have a lot of teak furniture so these aesthetically looked great but didn't hold up like the rest of the furniture. Pretty sad to see $400.00 so quickly damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Khousakoun

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction of product and delivery by Amazon
customer_reviews.text: We received this cutting board split in half. It looks like it was poorly "glued" together, and there was nothing to protect the board in the cardboard box. We are sending it back and I will not order another one. You can see the seams where it is glued. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Delphine Yee

customer_reviews.title: Cutting board is warping and rocks when using.
customer_reviews.text: Love the cutting board until it started warping. Why is it doing this??. I have washed and oiled with food grade mineral oil several times.
customer_reviews.author: craig durkee

customer_reviews.title: Good after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cutting board based on the America's Test Kitchen testing recommendation as a gift. Per the recipient, the board is holding up well although having such a sturdy cutting board does have a learning curve. Do pick up mineral oil for condition and take the time to condition 1-4 times before your first use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cutting board or art it is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: You need to buy the sealant and condition it. It’s beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Stuart M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful board
customer_reviews.text: It's great. Much too big for me; I would prefer a smaller size. It's heavy and bulky for me to handle. Nevertheless I wash and oil it and appreciate the beauty of the wood and the quality of the board. I would prefer not two sides but a "stand" on the bottom so it wouldn't get wet from the counter. Wish they offered that option. And an identical board in a size 2/3 of this one.
customer_reviews.author: wildflower

customer_reviews.title: Close, but a little disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Good size, weight and thickness, and so far no warping. Applied oil as soon as it arrived and the color is quite yellow. Guess that would be fine in some kitchens but it really doesn't work in ours. If that were the only issue I would give the board five stars, but the routed edges and drip groove have multiple areas that are very rough. More time should have been spent with a sander prior to packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, durable, wife loves it. Put some oil on it and let it set in. When you do that, the woods natural grain comes out and it is BEAUTIFUL !!!....so glad we bought this. Would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Commins

customer_reviews.title: Great board if it arrives in one piece!!
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer needs to do a better job protecting the board for shipping. My board came cracked. Lucky for me that I have the tools and adhesive to repair it. After the fix, the board looks beautiful in my kitchen with plenty of room to chop.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Collazo

customer_reviews.title: Using my new board all the time and loving it!
customer_reviews.text: Very glad I purchased the large board. Plenty of space and like that only one side has drip channel. Great instructions included for protecting and cleaning. Still keep my plastic boards for raw poultry, but otherwise I always use my wood board. Even trimmed and cut a whole tenderloin on it. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product and well worth the purchase price. The cutting board has a slight warp so it does rock and slide when used. I purchased a nonskid mat that took care of the problem. Still, the product was warped.
customer_reviews.author: John R Pidgeon

customer_reviews.title: Looks like Board is made very well
customer_reviews.text: Looks like Board is made very well. Its heavy duty and a good value. My issue is with QC and Shipping-1st board was cracked(should hv never been shipped-did not occure during shipping). 2nd board was not protected-packing material was bunched at one end of box & board was beat up. Looks like u hv a good manufacturor of Cutting Boards but a poor Manager of ur Supply Chain Network.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warps and bows
customer_reviews.text: Gave this board as a Christmas gift in December. It is already bowing and warping.
customer_reviews.author: Golojal

customer_reviews.title: Must have in any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Oil it once a month and it's good to go. I thought the wood would have been a little harder, but I think the oil may have softened it up a bit
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Really beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Needs conditioning but beautiful and very sturdy. Big, so pay attention to dimentions to make sure you have a place For it
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M Noonan

customer_reviews.title: Substantial
customer_reviews.text: This is a very serious cutting board. The quality seems terrific. I did treat mine with oil, as recommended, and that seems to have been worthwhile. It's a very stable support. A bit heavy to put away, but that's what makes it so stable. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cutting board!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and heavy board! There are small hollow outs on the ends to help move it around. I bought the Proteak oil as well which makes it look awesome. I bought it because I have granite countertops and it makes it difficult to knead and prepare some breads. A floured board is much easier to move dough around. I have not used it as a cutting board and have no plans to do so...
customer_reviews.author: NuiG

customer_reviews.title: Don’t.
customer_reviews.text: As I was seasoning, saw a crack. Further inspection revealed dents as if it were dropped prior to shipping. Shouldn’t happen with a $100 cutting board. Threw out the box already. :-( Will never buy from teakhaus and neither will my friends. And amazon is not limited to items under $10 Too risky.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J.

customer_reviews.title: Split After 6 Months.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this three times over less than 6 months. Tonight, on the third use, I noticed that the wood has split near a handle and the juice is leaking onto the counter. Three times I've used this. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Arrived cracked and unusable.  Beautiful except for that.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived cracked. Approximately a 6 inch crack on one side, traveling across edge and into other side about 2 inches. Very sad, as it's a beautiful board. I would have rated it very high had it been intact. Seems like exactly what I hoped for, except for damage.
customer_reviews.author: BenAroundTheBlock

customer_reviews.title: Very fine quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a competition cooker/smoker. The photo he sent to me was 2 briskets he was preparing to put on the grill. Great size! 14# is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: D G

customer_reviews.title: Enormous - thick and beautiful wood cutting board
customer_reviews.text: Enormous - thick and beautiful wood cutting board. We bought this to protect our new wood counter and absolutely love it. So much better than our old mini cutting boards. Purchased based on reviews on Wirecutter.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but smells awful
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid cutting board. It's nice and thick. The one I received was darker than pictured. I would give this more stars BUT there is one issue. Ever since I received it the board reeks of dirt/ dead earthworms and no cleaning or airing out has fixed it. So I'm stuck with a smelly board...
customer_reviews.author: Martha C.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Cut This Out of Your Budget
customer_reviews.text: It's big, it's beautiful, it's one of my favorite things in my kitchen. the only thing I don't really like is that it left knife marks right away and soaked up some red juice from strawberries, and I can't seem to get rid of it even though I had seasoned it and oil it regularly. I just flipped it over, so that works.
customer_reviews.author: espchica

customer_reviews.title: Warped and split within a few months of use
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing except wash it with soap and water and kept it oiled. Split down the middle and warped, no warranty. TeakHaus didn't even return my emails. Way too expensive for a board of this quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D Glaser

customer_reviews.title: It's falling apart
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the board on Dec 8th, 2019. The first problem we noticed is that it started to warp and wouldn't lay flat on the counter. Last week we saw that it had split down the middle. Perhaps we just received a defective product, but it was not worth the money. Six months after purchase we're throwing it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Philip J. McGovern

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! Make sure you think about if you have space in your kitchen to acually use it and store it. I use it over the sink as it is the only space large enough for this!
customer_reviews.author: Dietrichs

customer_reviews.title: Massive crack upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: This admittedly beautiful teak board arrived unpadded in a thin cardboard box, and had a deep crack along it's entire length. Any amount of use would have resulted in about three inches of the board breaking off. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Nice  B I G  board
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say? Juice well on one side is a plus. But I really bought this product because I was tired of pieces of food rolling off a regular sized board.
customer_reviews.author: RCJL

customer_reviews.title: Seams crack
customer_reviews.text: Had this board for a few months now. After a couple of months two of the seams (one on each side) started to come apart. Now there is a major crack along the length of the board. It gathers food and I don't think the board will remain whole much longer. We treated it with oil when received as recommended but it seems the glue just failed. Highly disappointing for such an expensive board... Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SHSK

customer_reviews.title: Decorative ok to leave on counter
customer_reviews.text: Excellent to cut/chop on whatever you cutting stays in place doesn’t move around. Use quite a bit still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: R.L.

customer_reviews.title: Knife friendly cutting board
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful cutting board. I use both sides since I bought the side with the drain channel for cutting up meat and poultry. But I use it all the time and love it. I love the large size, I can move things off to one side and still have plenty of cutting space on the board.
customer_reviews.author: Chesapeake Lady

customer_reviews.title: I could not love this more
customer_reviews.text: I could not love this more! The juice gutter is deep, so there's no spilling and the handles are nice and deep for a firm grip. That's important, because this is heavy, but it needs to be for a stable chopping surface. This is a well thought out design and beautiful to boot. I will use and treasure this for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cutting board ever!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! I was so tired of too small "toy" cutting boards that barely allowed any room to work. This one is really large and gives plenty of room to work. I would not want one any larger, this is perfect. Has a high quality look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: CFoster

customer_reviews.title: Fits as counter top to cabinet I bought at Lowes!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing cutting board. It is very heavy duty. It was a perfect solution to use as a counter top to a cabinet/drawers I bought at Lowes, it fit perfect by my stove. I seasoned well with J.K. Adams 8-Ounce Mineral Oil Wood Conditioner (also purchased on Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Howie

customer_reviews.title: Cutting board
customer_reviews.text: Great board and very pretty, I only use the board for rolling out pastry, cookies and bread and it works very well, exactly what I was looking for and looks wonderful on the counter
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: I performed a lot of research for a nice, large cutting board
customer_reviews.text: I performed a lot of research for a nice, large cutting board. I love this board! Very pretty, stable and BIG! EXTREMELY prompt delivery. It is very even and the groove to liquid is a must. I'd highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jill K. Snider

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cutting board
customer_reviews.text: Beware of how huge and heavy this is before ordering. Amazing cutting board, but too large for storing under a sink (or anywhere for that matter!) ;-D Had to return it because it was too large and cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Shmeitan Mericker

customer_reviews.title: Not worth price. Damaged !!
customer_reviews.text: Chipped and dinged. Wood looked dirty. Nothing like what is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw how big this board was (24x18), I couldn't imagine why I'd thought I'd needed such a large board. It is a bear to carry to the sink to wash. However I absolutely love it. It's gorgeous on my counter and the space allows for a lot of work room. I don't tend to use the carving board side, but I like the idea that it there if I need it. The grooves cut into the ends are a lifesaver for moving this board. All in all a large beautiful cutting board that I admire and use multiple times throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S. Gant

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and hasn't warped after months of use
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and hasn't warped after months of use. I keep it well oiled and mostly use it for an aesthetic base.
customer_reviews.author: C. Van Horn

customer_reviews.title: Great board that's easy on your knives.
customer_reviews.text: Great cutting board. Highly rated by Cook's Illustrated and after I received one as a gift, I now understand why!
customer_reviews.author: Dr ROK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful cutting board! It is rather large and therefore heavy but this is what I was looking for to use for carving turkeys and other large jobs...
customer_reviews.author: Lynn D.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It is a beautiful board
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It is a beautiful board. I oil it as suggested. It is heavy and stays in place. If you want a flat surface just flip it over. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: mike b

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & functional
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully durable, and easy on my knives. Just wish I could afford the end grain as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Warping board after 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful board but I'm more than a little disappointed that it is warping after two months of use. Oiled the board and have not let it sit in water/liquid. This hasn't happened with other wood boards. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Kroll

customer_reviews.title: and am still very satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a couple years ago, and am still very satisfied with it. The board has warped a little bit along the grain of the wood, but nothing too serious; it doesn't affect the stability of the board on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is gorgeous, it's also huge and heavy everything cuts easily on it and it won't slide around while your cutting.
customer_reviews.author: James Brooks

customer_reviews.title: That’s the good. If had to order again I wouldn’t have ...
customer_reviews.text: Thick and heavy. That’s the good. If had to order again I wouldn’t have gotten the grooves. They are too narrow and difficult to clean. Also the color is fading.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. Didn't last a year!
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board split just before we had it a year. Don't waste your money. The last board we had for ten years. Pretty but not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This product is very sturdy and beefy. When the seasoning was complete, it proved to be very easy clean. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, attractive cutting board
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I ordered one for my outdoor kitchen and it never made it off my indoor cook top. Will make great Christmas Gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful cutting board. It's the perfect size, might seem to big, but wait till you start using it and have plenty of room to cut, chop an move things off to the side and still have room. It's a showpiece too, looks absolutley beautiful on my kitchen counter. Easy to clean......just read the insert that comes with it, to avoid bacteria growth, just clean it and dry it with a papertowel after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: great on my gas stove when I need to display ...
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular to look at, utilitarian, great on my gas stove when I need to display buffet plates.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaGondola

customer_reviews.title: Great present!
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board is very durable and will definitely stand up to years of use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the board
customer_reviews.text: The board I received did not have a juice canal on either side of the board as described. I exchanged it for a second one, and that one also came without a juice canal. I don't think that amazon is selling the juice canal model any longer and has instead decided to exchange it with a solid one. Overall, I love the board, but taking a star off as the product was not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: It was even better than all the reviews! The color is gorgeous. It is a great size and will be useful for so many things. Love the juice canal, especially for slicing raw meat.
customer_reviews.author: Susan G

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and large and thick and doesn't show knife marks ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and large and thick and doesn't show knife marks so far. Too big to move in and out of cupboard each time you want to use it. It's a kitchen landmark.
customer_reviews.author: MyOpinion4

customer_reviews.title: ... promised i have used it several times already with great results at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality cutting board it was exactly what i was looking for when i ordered it online it arrived as promised i have used it several times already with great results at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Atwood

customer_reviews.title: ... was looking for after doing my research on the best cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board is exactly what I was looking for after doing my research on the best cutting boards. It has enhanced our kitchen nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Echoman007

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition, even to a small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This board has earned a permanent place on our counter top. I've used it daily for six months and have had no issues with cracking, warping, or anything else. I take good care of it, always keeping it dry and oiling it on regular occasion. Not only does it make a wonderful cutting surface, but I also use it when I'm making bread or rolling out pie crusts.
customer_reviews.author: P. Isaac Hildebrandt

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have for anyone that makes BBQ ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for anyone that makes BBQ. It has the space and durability that you need to handle 10+ lbs of BBQ. This cutting is well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nick

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love. We wanted one for years and we will be buying another it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space~both a pro and a con
customer_reviews.text: Bought this due to Atk reviews. Heavy and hard to clean because it doesn't fit well in the sink. Even still, I love the size and am glad I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat VanCott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality cutting board. Make sure you also order oil to keep the wood healthy
customer_reviews.author: E. Feurer

customer_reviews.title: but it is amazing! He loved how study and big it is
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and at first was worried it was too big, but it is amazing! He loved how study and big it is. If you don't have a lot of counter space this is not for you though.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Kelly

customer_reviews.title: The wood appears to be soft for a cutting board
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the knife cuts it has shown
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: America's Test Kitchen Recommended Board
customer_reviews.text: America's Test Kitchen on PBS said that this is the board they use in their facilities. We like in our home kitchen. It arrived on time and as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Dale P.

customer_reviews.title: very good cutting board
customer_reviews.text: A very, very good cutting board. After 1.5 years of moderate/heavy use, there's very little wear in the main cutting regions. Oil it every 3-4 months, and it's good to go.
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: but it is a beautiful cutting board
customer_reviews.text: It might be a little heavier than you would expect, but it is a beautiful cutting board!
customer_reviews.author: Dale Weiss

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Proteak cutting board is a thing of beauty! I'm sure with the proper care it will last quite a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Like it with reservations
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I first saw it highly recommended on America's Test Kitchen. After doing some research, I found great things on teak wood and its use in the kitchen. I do love how beautiful it is, how nice it is on my knives, the huge size; however, no matter how much cutting board oil I apply, I feel like it's still so "dry" and "thirsty". Also, I don't know if this is normal or not, but there are areas where you can see the wood almost fraying slightly =/. Also, don't get this if you don't have large sinks or a way to wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Shakil I. Hafiz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this board, but it has warped a little, so I'm kind of sad.
customer_reviews.author: betmax

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best cutting board ever. Also bought without the juice canal and I prefer that style.
customer_reviews.author: Descee

customer_reviews.title: Five Star Review
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a month, but I love it. It makes kneading dough and shaping cut-out cookies so much easier. The wood grips onto the flour, so dough doesn't stick, but neither does the dough pull up too much flour when working. Mine came in a gigantic box without any sort of measures to keep it from getting damaged in transit. Luckily, mine was not warped or cracked once it arrived. I love the handles on the side, and the size lets me place it on my stove top if space is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ligeia

customer_reviews.title: Durable and looks good, too.
customer_reviews.text: I've invested a significant amount of money in good knives that went dull far too quickly. This cutting board changed all of that. It's sturdy, large enough to butcher a chicken or cut a baguette and cleans up easily. Although the price seems a bit steep initially, you won't have to replace it...ever.
customer_reviews.author: Ladylou302

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Works great and looks amazing. The only problem is finding a place to store it because it is BIG.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for .....
customer_reviews.text: First impression...this is a sturdy, very large and beautiful cutting board. With Thanksgiving around the corner I can't wait to use this. I will check back in after the cooking marathon is over
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful. It's very thick and sturdy. Don't drop it, you'll break your foot. :)
customer_reviews.author: scmom

customer_reviews.title: Split
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wood, however there was a split in the end of the board. Returned item.
customer_reviews.author: OS

customer_reviews.title: Great teak board
customer_reviews.text: This board is not only beautiful but sturdy and heavy. It should last for years. It is made from the strongest wood and will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and functional
customer_reviews.text: This isn't just a cutting board, it's a work of art. Yes, it's big and it's heavy, but then....that's exactly what I wanted. If you're looking for a cutting board that'll last a few lifetimes and do its job day in and day out, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cutting board. Solid, sturdy, thick and heavy. Quality board for serious cooks.
customer_reviews.author: ROB LINDSEY

customer_reviews.title: great cutting board
customer_reviews.text: Well-made, sturdy and overall excellent quality. It is quite large, which is what I was looking for, so be sure you have the space to use/store it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tavakoli

product_meta.title: TeakHaus by Proteak Edge Grain Cutting Board w/Hand Grip + Juice Canal (Rectangle) | 20" x 15" x 1.5"
product_meta.description: Size:20" x 15" x 1.5"Voted by America’s Test Kitchen as the best cutting board for home chefs and professionals alike, the Edge Grain Traditional Cutting Boards by TeakHaus are built to last a lifetime of use. Made of FSC-certified teak wood that contains natural oily resins to keep the board looking fresh over time, this spacious 20” x 15” cutting board has plenty of workspace for you to chop fresh produce, carve meats, and prepare delicious meals with ease. With a durable and elegant edge grain surface that’s resistant to splitting and warping, this superior cutting board can be used daily without dulling your knives or losing its smooth, flat surface. This hefty board has a sturdy weight that won’t slip while in use and features integrated hand grips for easy movement around the kitchen. Plus, it has a built-in juice canal along the border to catch excess liquids from ripe tomatoes, juicy meats, and more, so your work surface stays clean and organized while preparing food. With the perfect balance of functionality and style, the ProTeak Edge Grain Cutting Board will quickly become your favorite tool for all your prepping and cutting needs!
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR QUALITY | We developed cutting boards inspired by a Social Kitchen concept, the place where we share food and great moments with the people we love. Made of certified FSC (Forest Stewardship Council) teak wood from well-managed forests. Teak is moisture-resistant and stain-resistant which protects the board from splitting, warping and scarring.

THE LAST BOARD YOU WILL EVER NEED | TeakHaus boards are featured as part of the series nicknamed “The Last Cutting Board You’ll Ever Need” By Cook's Illustrated Magazine & America's Test Kitchen. Our boards are built to last a lifetime of use.

ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION | TeakHaus is passionately committed to taking care of each part of the process from our forest to your home. We develop teak forests on previously underdeveloped lands using the best available technology.
EASY TO CARE FOR | Our boards are easy to clean and maintain. Simply hand wash after use and upkeep with apply mineral oil occasionally for longevity.
